articles.description: News of Oksana Shvets' death after her Kyiv flat was attacked by Russian forces was confirmed by the Young Theatre, a Ukrainian theatre company she had previously been working with.
articles.content:
One of Ukraines most famous stage actresses has been killed in a Russian rocket attack while she slept in an apartment in southeast Kyiv.
News of Oksana Shvets death was confirmed by the Young Theat… [+13204 chars]

articles.title: Andrew Garfield: 'If we only let people play exactly who they are, it'll be the death of imagination' - The Telegraph
articles.description: From a job in Sainsbury’s to a $1.9 billion film and now an Oscar nod – how the star of Spider-Man and Tick, Tick… Boom! conquered Hollywood
articles.content: It was the proudest gig to date of Andrew Garfields career: standing on top of a bin in central Madrid while playing air guitar with a tortilla chip. He was 21, and had only appeared in a handful of … [+1862 chars]

articles.author: Christopher Stevens
articles.title: The cheeky elephants who can walk on tiptoe: Stories told by Sir David Attenborough in Dynasties - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sir David Attenborough narrates the latest series of Dynasties. Among the epic footage is the rare birth of twin elephants at Amboseli National Park in Kenya in the shadow of Mount Kilimanjaro.
articles.content: Everyone knows the hardships endured by wildlife film-makers the long days and weeks spent hunched in a hide, patiently waiting for a single glimpse of an elusive snow leopard or a black jaguar. For … [+7409 chars]
